name: Reboot (itch) (hardD)
description:
Hello) This is my firs game jam. I had much more ideas fo this game but this is what i ended up with. Hope you enjoy.

CONTROLS:

Shift: crouch

Hold LMB: shoot

MMB: reload

RMB click on craft buttons or white indicators will craft items/repair robot

F: throw a bomb

R: place a mine

G: activate the mines

E: open chests/collect parts.

Shoot locks to open them(requaiers a key)

Avoid spikes or deep water.

Creates usually contain a normal drop but may contain surprises. Shoot them to find out.3

GOAL: Find an exit.

!(The game is "nv.exe" in the folder)!
